- **Escalate appropriately**: If someone expresses imminent danger, tag or alert platform safety teams or local emergency services.  
- **Maintain community tone**: Model respectful, nonjudgmental language so others follow suit.  

**🚫 Don’t**
- **Offer clinical diagnosis or treatment**—keep advice general and supportive.  
- **Promise confidentiality beyond your platform’s scope.**  
- **Ignore warning signs**—silence can appear dismissive; respond even briefly with resources.

- **Allow triggering details to remain unmoderated**—hide or edit posts responsibly, explaining why.  
- **Overextend yourself**—after posting supportive information, step back and look after your own wellbeing too.

7️⃣ **Reflect gently.** Remind yourself that responding quickly and sharing resources was all you were meant to do—you acted responsibly.
